column9:
Some projects use optional dependencies, like below (taken from ch.qos.logback:logback-core:1.1.1). Should be added to the dependency data and representation. 
    
      javax.mail
      mail
      compile
      true
core API and functionality of domain objects and analysers needs to be checked by tests.

column5: replace exception trace output with human messages
column9: Currently the tool spits raw exception traces sometimes. This needs to be replaced by STDERR output that is human readable.
